row_headers:
Reconsider companies XYZ and ABC from Concept Check 2.4. Calculate the percentage change in the market-
value-weighted index. Compare that to the rate of return of a portfolio that holds $500 of ABC stock for every
$100 of XYZ stock (i.e., an index portfolio).
